author: hboutemy
msg: update maven-release version (which is unfortunately hardcoded)

author: jawi
msg: Several improvements in the Web UI:
- added proper icons for unlinking and removing items (thanks to Marrs for creating them);
- removed the "dynamic links" checkbox and instead allow bundles by the BSN to be dropped
on features to create dynamic links;
- cleanup and simplification of lots of UI code possible due to earlier refactorings.

author: jawi
msg: When not able to create a new distribution for a target, throw an IOException instead of an IllegalStateException, as this it is not a state-problem, but a user problem.

author: jawi
msg: - split out the "manage users" functionality from the "my info" functionality
as to make the UI more heterogenous for various roles;
- take the current User from the Application instead of let it being passed
- made some improvements in the layout and usability of the various forms, by
making fields required and showing notifications when something is done.
